name: Kaya-Kwang
description:
An action adventure game about shaman Kaya-Kwang and climbing the Rakhu mountain. 

You will travel through overgrown swamps to the freezing north and fight against wrathful bosses. Fight the mountain dwellers infected with the Filth and release their spirits at the end of the journey.

Team

Sofia Selyanina // София Селянина
Game Design & Management

Anastasia Repina // Анастасия Репина
Game Design, Level Design, Textures & UI

Alisa Zamkova // Алиса Замкова
3D Modeling & Animation, VFX

Vladimir Kotikov // Владимир Котиков
Unreal Engine 4 programming

Alpha release

end of June, 2022
